name: Final Fantasy III + Final Fantasy IV: Double Pack Edition
summary:
Two of the most representative titles of the classic role-playing game series, brought together to get lost in their timeless stories of heroes, betrayal, love and redemption... now on PC.

Final Fantasy III

The game includes new and improved story sequences and 3D graphics, trading cards and Steam achievements, as well as new designs for Master's Diplomas. When darkness falls over the world and the light disappears, four young people are chosen by the crystals to embark on an adventure and save the world.

Final Fantasy IV

As the first game in the series to introduce the innovative continuous-time battle system, this classic title marked a milestone in Final Fantasy history. The game tells the story of Cecil, a dark knight who seeks redemption and ends up at the center of a battle that will decide the fate of the world.
